hypothesis_content.title: BTC Weekend Volatility Compression Breakout
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC consolidates within a ±1.5% range during the Saturday 12:00-18:00 UTC window (low liquidity period) after a neutral/bear week, a breakout in either direction during Sunday's Asian session (00:00-06:00 UTC) will continue for +2.5% minimum before Monday's London open.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Weekend liquidity gaps create exaggerated moves when consolidation breaks. Asian session often sets tone for Sunday flows. Neutral/bear regimes have less institutional participation, amplifying retail-driven weekend moves.
entry_conditions: BTC 4h close within ±1.5% of opening price during Saturday 12:00-18:00 UTC
Weekly regime is NEUTRAL or BEAR (confidence > 55%)
Break above/below Saturday range high/low during Sunday 00:00-06:00 UTC

exit_conditions.stop_loss: ±1.8% from entry price (beyond Saturday range extreme)
exit_conditions.time_exit: Sunday 23:59 UTC if neither TP nor SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 45% of signals reverse beyond Saturday range then fail to reach ±2.5% target before Monday open across 50+ occurrences.
